questions.question_text: If there are any users in the organization that shouldn't have view access to Account records, the OWD for Accounts should be set to

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
=> https://help.salesforce.com/s/articleView?id=sf.security_sharing_owd_users.htm&type=5
For user records, you can set the organization-wide sharing default to Private or Public Read Only. The default must be set to Private if there is at least one user who shouldnâ€™t see a record.

questions.question_text: The SideBar search does not Search the following: Choose 3 answers

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
ABC are correct
Side Bar disable to find Documents , products and Solutions

List of standard objects in SalesForce. All of them are now standard objects. The list is huge.
https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.232.0.object_reference.meta/object_reference/sforce_api_objects_list.htm

comments.content: I was just looking the sidebar. I have not found Products, documents and solutions. So, apparently the answer is correct.

discussion.content: Products will be searchable using Global search :)
Products has become a standard salesforce object, now it's researchable in sidebar!

questions.question_text: Workflow Tasks are NOT tracked in the Activity History and can be reported on MMM?

discussion.content: yeah not sure about MMM, it can be MM-YY-DD but question is not very clear.
Maybe they mean the date format (MMM-YY)
Maybe this is a stupid question, but what stands for MMM?

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers would like their sales reps to be able to send branded email invitations to customers for business meetings and to collaborate with customers from a branded Website to find a suitable meeting time.
How can an Administrator accomplish this?

discussion.content: I think A is correct answer. Not sure how B is correct answer

Selected Answer: A
I don't see why B is correct
Can someone please explain how is #B correct?

choices.B: Add a company logo to meeting requests in Salesforce
choices.A: Create a custom email template for invitations that displays your compant logo
choices.C: Create an external integration with Google calendar using Sites
choices.D: Enable Chatter to allow reps to Communicate with customers

questions.question_text:
Marketing and Sales users at Universal Containers would like more visibility into Lead and Contact participation in this years Trade Show. How would an
Administrator build this into the application? Choose 2 answers

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: AC
AC are correct.

choices.D: Create Cross-object formula fields to display lead or contact record details on a campaign member record
choices.B: Alert lead and contact owners with workflow when a prospective customer regsiters for the event
choices.A: Create Cross-object formula fields to display campaign member record details on a lead or a contact record
choices.C: Customize the campaign member related list on the lead or contact object
